column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=This morning we needed to take the train into the city .
#id=2
#text=We grabbed our laptop computers to use while we were going to be traveling .
#id=3
#text=We had to make sure we also remembered our passes to get on the train .
#id=4
#text=As we arrived at the station , we saw the train coming in .
#id=5
#text=Many people got off the train when it arrived and then we entered the train .
#id=6
#text=We were able to find seats even though the train was pretty full .
#id=7
#text=As the train left the station we started working on our computers , and the 20 minute ride seemed to just fly by .
#id=8
#text=The view of the city from the train was beautiful .
#id=9
#text=When we arrived at the station in the city , the people on the train started to queue up at the doorways .
#text=The train came to a smooth stop and all the people poured out onto the platform where it was lightly raining .
